items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Classic Margherita with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.

items.name: Pepperoni Pizza
items.description: A delicious pizza topped with pepperoni and mozzarella cheese.

items.name: Veggie Pizza
items.description: Pizza loaded with bell peppers, olives, onions, and tomatoes.

items.name: Burrito Bowl
items.description: A bowl filled with rice, beans, meat of choice, salsa, and guacamole.

items.name: Tacos
items.description: Three tacos with your choice of filling, topped with lettuce and cheese.
